title: デビュー戦の後に・ワガママヒート

text.jpText:
デビュー戦を走り終えたスイープトウショウ
だったが、イライラするあまり
レースに集中することができなかった。
text.enText:
Sweepstakes Sweepstakes was finishing her 
debut race, but she was so frustrated that 
she could not concentrate on the race. She 
was so frustrated that she could not 
concentrate on the race.

text.jpText:
記者から次の目標を聞かれると『阪神JF』
と愛想なく答えた。その態度を記者から
たしなめられると、さらに機嫌を悪くする。
text.enText:
When asked by a reporter what her next 
goal was, she replied, "The Hanshin JF. 
When the reporter criticized her attitude, 
she became even more ill-tempered. When 
the reporter criticized her attitude, she 
became even more ill-tempered.

text.jpText:
仕舞いには控室に閉じこもり、
やがて疲れて寝てしまった。ひとまず
次の目標は『阪神JF』にしておこう。
text.enText:
Finally, I locked myself in the waiting 
room and eventually fell asleep. For 
the time being, I decided to set my next 
target as "Hanshin JF". I'll set my next 
target as "Hanshin JF".
